author: FilmCow
description:
Welcome to the valley. Relax, take off all your shoes, and enjoy some soothing video games. Check the description below for more info.

I stream daily from 11 p.m. to 1 a.m. Eastern Time.

Current game schedule:
Mon - TBD
Tue - Super Mario World (SNES)
Wed - Golvellius: Valley of Doom (Master System)
Thu - Nightmares from The Deep 2: The Siren's Call (PS4)
Fri - TBD
Sat - Assorted Sega Saturn games
Sun - Assorted PC / Mac games

Chat rules:
* No harassment.
* No racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, ableism, fatphobia, or other such things.
* No overtly sexual comments.
* No self-promotion unless given permission.
* No spamming (this includes asking the same question over and over.)
* No backseat gaming if the "No Backseat Gaming" cloud is displayed on the TV (unless help is asked for!) This includes mentioning game spoilers, even minor ones.
* No gimmick accounts.

Is it your birthday? We have a machine for that. Please read the following if you'd like to enter your name into the
title: Nightmares from The Deep 2: The Siren's Call (PS4) | The Video Game Valley
